prop.head.headtext: Handling Cases Before the Judicial Panel on Multidistrict Litigation

prop.head.label.name: Chapter
prop.head.headtext: Factors in Deciding Whether Transfer Is Appropriate

head.headtext: Arguments rejected by the Panel—Possibility that transfer would cause additional filings

para.paratext: The Panel has regularly rejected the argument that creating a centralized MDL docket will create an incentive for filing additional actions.[1] The Panel sometimes rejects this argument without particular explanation; in other cases it explains that this concern can be addressed by the transferee judge presiding over the centralized proceedings.[2]
Maslon Edelman Borman & Brand, LLP, Minneapolis, Minnesota.
